simplenlg.lexicon.english

Class XMLLexicon

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplenlg.lexicon.Lexicon
      • simplenlg.lexicon.XMLLexicon
        • simplenlg.lexicon.english.XMLLexicon

  • public class XMLLexicon
extends XMLLexicon
    This class loads words from an XML lexicon. All features specified in the lexicon are loaded
    Author:
    ereiter
